p.span: “Charting NATO’s Next Chapter: From Afghanistan to Ukraine and beyond”

body.p: Atlantic Council and IFS conference, Oslo 19 March. - Speech by Minister of Defence Ine Eriksen Søreide: -As NATO draws down from its mission in Afghanistan and enters a new chapter in its history, we find ourselves challenged by a deteriorating security situation at the gates of Europe. […] The political role that NATO plays is of great value to Norway. We are fully part of NATO's collective approach. We strongly defend the right of every nation to decide its own future. [...]
The Minister and Executive VP of the Atlantic Council, Damon Wilson (Norwegian Defence)
